summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 3761 , for the improvement of the alley in block 3, Brooklyn Addition, from East 43rd Street to East 45th Street, by paving and otherwise improving the same, under Ordinance No. 46243 and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
